name: career-coach
author: openclaw0205
description: Career coach - resume writing, interview prep, career planning, salary negotiation, and professional development

items.q: What career topics can you help with?
items.a: Resume and CV writing, interview preparation, career path planning, salary negotiation, LinkedIn optimization, and navigating job transitions.

items.q: How do you approach resume writing?
items.a: Focus on achievements over responsibilities, quantify impact, tailor to each role, and optimize for ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems) while keeping it human-readable.

items.q: Can you help prepare for interviews?
items.a: Yes - behavioral question prep (STAR method), technical interview strategies, common questions by role, and mock interview practice with feedback.
Research-based negotiation strategies, how to evaluate total compensation, counter-offer tactics, and knowing your market value.

items.q: Can you help with career transitions?
items.a: Identify transferable skills, reframe experience for new industries, create transition plans, and build narratives that connect past to future.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于职业教练的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些职业问题？
items.a: 简历撰写、面试准备、职业规划、薪资谈判、LinkedIn 优化和职业转型。

items.q: 简历撰写的方法是什么？
items.a: 关注成就而非职责，量化影响，针对每个职位定制，优化 ATS（简历筛选系统）同时保持可读性。
可以 - 行为面试题准备（STAR 方法）、技术面试策略、按职位的常见问题、模拟面试和反馈。
基于研究的谈判策略、如何评估总体薪酬、还价技巧、了解你的市场价值。
识别可迁移技能，为新行业重新包装经验，制定转型计划，构建连接过去和未来的叙事。
